item.title: Hacking C# Part One: Adjustable Arrays
item.description: Create arrays that can be adjusted, but without needing you to first enumerate

item.title: Hacking C# Part Two: Fluent Function Interfaces
item.description: Cut down on complicated function paramter sets by creating quick and easy fluent interfaces

item.title: Hacking C# Part Three: Compare Adjacent Array Elements
item.description: Run comparisons on adjacent elements in an Enumerable without enumerating to array first
